statements: SELECT * FROM ingredient_origin
SELECT ingredient_name, farm_name, harvest_date FROM ingredient_origin WHERE farm_location = 'California'
SELECT ingredient_name, farm_name FROM ingredient_origin WHERE harvest_date = '2022-05-01'
SELECT farm_name, farm_location FROM ingredient_origin ORDER BY farm_location DESC
SELECT ingredient_id, ingredient_name FROM ingredient_origin WHERE farm_name LIKE '%Farm%'
SELECT * FROM ingredient_origin WHERE farm_name = 'Organic Farms' ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, farm_location FROM ingredient_origin WHERE harvest_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT farm_name, COUNT(ingredient_id) AS total_ingredients FROM ingredient_origin GROUP BY farm_name ORDER BY total_ingredients DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_origin WHERE farm_location IN ('California', 'Oregon') AND harvest_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT ingredient_name, farm_location, harvest_date FROM ingredient_origin WHERE farm_name LIKE '%Farm%' AND harvest_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC, harvest_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Ingredient
SELECT meal_name, meal_description FROM Meal
SELECT ingredient_name, origin_country FROM Ingredient ORDER BY origin_country DESC
SELECT meal_name FROM Meal ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM Ingredient WHERE origin_country='Italy'
SELECT * FROM Ingredient WHERE origin_country = 'Italy';
SELECT meal_name, meal_description FROM Meal WHERE ingredient_id = 3;
SELECT ingredient_name AS IngredientName, origin_country AS Origin FROM Ingredient WHERE id = 2;
SELECT meal_name, ingredient_name FROM Meal JOIN Ingredient ON Meal.ingredient_id = Ingredient.id;
SELECT * FROM Meal ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Ingredient;
SELECT id, name FROM Meal;
SELECT name, origin FROM Ingredient;
SELECT * FROM Meal WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM IngredientMapping ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT name, amount, origin FROM IngredientMapping JOIN Ingredient ON IngredientMapping.ingredient_id = Ingredient.id ORDER BY name ASC, amount DESC
SELECT * FROM Ingredient WHERE origin = 'Italy' AND id IN (SELECT ingredient_id FROM IngredientMapping WHERE meal_id = 2)
SELECT Meal.name, SUM(IngredientMapping.amount) AS total_amount FROM IngredientMapping JOIN Meal ON IngredientMapping.meal_id = Meal.id GROUP BY Meal.name ORDER BY total_amount DESC

SELECT DISTINCT Meal.name, COUNT(IngredientMapping.ingredient_id) AS ingredient_count FROM IngredientMapping JOIN Meal ON IngredientMapping.meal_id = Meal.id GROUP BY Meal.name HAVING ingredient_count > 2

SELECT Ingredient.name AS ingredient_name, Meal.name AS meal_name, IngredientMapping.amount FROM IngredientMapping JOIN Ingredient ON IngredientMapping.ingredient_id = Ingredient.id JOIN Meal ON IngredientMapping.meal_id = Meal.id ORDER BY meal_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Meal;
SELECT meal_name, serving_size FROM Meal WHERE serving_size > 4;
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name, cuisine_type FROM Recipe WHERE chef_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT ingredient_name, origin_country FROM Ingredient WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT meal_name, recipe_name, serving_size FROM Meal JOIN Recipe ON Meal.recipe_id = Recipe.recipe_id;
SELECT * FROM Ingredient WHERE origin_country = 'Italy';
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type FROM Recipe ORDER BY chef_name DESC;
SELECT meal_name, serving_size FROM Meal WHERE serving_size > 2 AND serving_size < 5;
SELECT i.ingredient_name, s.supplier_name FROM Ingredient i JOIN Supplier s ON i.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;

SELECT r.recipe_name, m.meal_name, i.ingredient_name FROM Recipe r JOIN Meal m ON r.recipe_id = m.recipe_id JOIN Ingredient i ON m.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id ORDER BY r.recipe_name ASC, m.meal_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_id, ingredient_name, origin_country FROM Ingredients WHERE origin_country = 'Italy';
SELECT farm_name, farm_location FROM Ingredients WHERE origin_country = 'USA' ORDER BY farm_location DESC;
SELECT chef_name, chef_specialty FROM Chefs WHERE chef_specialty = 'Italian Cuisine';
SELECT truck_name, location FROM FoodTrucks WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY truck_name ASC;
SELECT truck_id, truck_name, location FROM FoodTrucks WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT chef_name, chef_specialty FROM Chefs ORDER BY chef_specialty DESC;
SELECT meal_name, preparation_time, serving_size FROM Meals WHERE preparation_time > 60 AND serving_size < 4;
SELECT recipe_name, meal_name, chef_name FROM Recipes INNER JOIN Meals ON Recipes.meal_id = Meals.meal_id INNER JOIN Chefs ON Recipes.chef_id = Chefs.chef_id;
SELECT ingredient_name, farm_name, farm_location FROM Ingredients WHERE origin_country = 'Italy' ORDER BY farm_name ASC;
